alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Arapahoe and south central Adams Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 319 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Bennett, or 25 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Aurora, Bennett, Watkins, Strasburg and Manila Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
